law.catch_line: While in the program, an inmate must remain in the inmate's approved dwelling except:...
law.text:
While in the program, an inmate must remain in the inmate's approved dwelling except:
with the approval of the program administrator, to go directly to and from:
the inmate's approved place of employment;
medical or mental health treatment; or
offices of the Department;
as required by legitimate medical or other emergencies; or
as otherwise allowed or directed by the program administrator.
